entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -29.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -34.7°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 30.
